data.front: Explain the concept of malnutrition by considering the most important information
back: A condition resulting from the lack of absorption or the lack of consumption of nutritional substances, leading to a change in body composition, physical and mental impairment of the body’s function, and adversely affecting the outcome of treatment of the underlying disease

data.front: Patients who are seriously overweight or obese are most often accompanied by malnutrition of the Kwashiorkor type.
Co przedstawiono na zdjęciu? (What is shown in the picture?)
back: Oral nutritional supplements (DSP) or industrial oral diets (DDP)(…)
